0.1.0.name: wordpress/tyrone-the-wp-watchdog
0.1.0.description: Tyrone turns a WordPress installation into a website monitoring tool. Check the status of your sites, and keep tabs on which need upgrading, and scan for known spam terms, as well as changes to site content.
